title: Mine Farm (Minecraft style farm traktor sim)
description:
Feel yourself like a farmer in cube stylized World.

Feel yourself like a real farmer in cube stylised World with this Tractor 3D Simulator Game.
Connect beautiful animated trailers and drive through farm fields, harvest wheat crop and feel the cube country life.

NO ANY IN-APP PURCHASES, JUST GET THIS GAME AND ENJOY.

Features:
- Minecraft's styled world
- In first levels has tutorial
- fast graphics
- awesome soundtracks
- different camera views
- realistic 8bit sounds
- different trailers: digger, harvester, seeds, water.
- easy to use control.

Supports different camera views so you can test how it feels like driving farmer tractor and live in a country side.The graphics is optimized for mobile devices.

Thanks for gaming!
